name: K. Ram Babu
label: Senior Engineer at TMEIC
summary: I am an avid programmer and Python programming enthusiast. I like developing applications in Python 3 - from writing Automation Scripts to Web development using Django and Flask frameworks

I often solve problems on online coding platforms like HackerRank, Codechef, LeetCode, etc., to enhance my problem solving abilities. I am also a frequent contributor on StackOverflow, the largest programmer question and answer forum on the web.

work_experience.summary: Backend Engineer for Steel Plant Automation project. Developing a dashboard with widgets to visualize manufacturing processes in steel plants.
highlights: Developing REST APIs for front-end widget consumption
Testing and optimizing REST APIs for improved performance
Enhancing code for faster loading times
Direct customer interaction for requirements and feedback

work_experience.summary: Worked as an ETL Developer for a Healthcare Project. Majorly worked on SQL, Informatica PowerCenter and UNIX Shell Scripting.
highlights: Performed detailed Source to Target Data Analysis and Transformation Analysis.
Used ETL process to Extract, Transform and Load the data from various sources into Staging area and Data Warehouse.
Designed and Created Mappings, Sessions and Workflows to fetch data from multiple source systems to Data Warehouse by maintaining Source Data Integrity.

projects.title: Blog Application
projects.summary: Developed a Blog application using Django framework.
highlights: User Authentication - Users can register, login and logout
Users can Like and Comment on posts.

projects.title: COVID-19 India Tracker
projects.summary: A Dashboard showing the spread of COVID-19 in India and it's states.
highlights: Visualization of Cummulative and Daily spread across India and it's states
Shows detailed data of States and Districts
Search for vaccination centers by area PIN code.

education.institution: Sreenidhi Institute of Science and Technology
degrees: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
